# update(from:)

**Instance Method**

Reshapes the SceneKit geometry to match the specified plane mesh.

## Declaration

```swift
func update(from planeGeometry: ARPlaneGeometry)
```

## Parameters

- **planeGeometry**: A coarse mesh representation of a detected plane’s estimated shape.

## Discussion

To update a SceneKit model of a plane actively tracked in an AR session, call this method in your [doc://com.apple.arkit/documentation/ARKit/ARSCNViewDelegate] object’s [doc://com.apple.arkit/documentation/ARKit/ARSCNViewDelegate/renderer(_:didUpdate:for:)] callback, passing the [doc://com.apple.arkit/documentation/ARKit/ARPlaneAnchor/geometry] property from the [doc://com.apple.arkit/documentation/ARKit/ARPlaneAnchor] object that callback provides.
